results.description:
Hello everyone,

Exciting times and really about time that I got the ball rolling and organised the first Intelligence and Analysis Professionals Meetup. I've managed to get the support of the Hague Tech, which will be a great location [www.thehaguetech.nl] as there are a lot of other very interesting things going on there.

The time I have set is between 19:00 and 21:00 so as to allow for travel after work and the date [Thursday 30 August] allows us to get the first Meetup organised as soon as possible after the main summer holidays.

At the moment I am hoping, we start with some introductions followed by two 30 minute presentations with discussions. Possible topics are:

- Cyber issues in Intelligence and Analysis
- Introduction to non-standard data types [IoT, Cyber, Network]
- Ergonomics of Intelligence Analysis [soft skills and leadership]
- Open Source Intelligence [OSINT]

Please send me your views [I want to include everyone on this community and also the time slot [there is a possibility to organise this Meetup for the same day between 17:00 and 19:00].

I'll add to this post closer to the time of the Meetup.

Looking forward to meeting you, so please sign up!

Best wishes,

Ammi
results.how_to_find_us: We have chosen this location as it is very central [5 minute walk from Central Station]. Hopefully will enable the porfessionals in nearby cities to attend. The Hague Tech also has a relaxed atmosphere and I'll try to organise drinks and bites.
results.name: Time to organise the first IAP Meetup! Let's get this thing going..

results.description:
After the first successful Meetup we wanted to follow up as soon as possible with another tying in with The Hague Cyber Security Week. Hence, this Meetup will have a Cyber and Tech focus.

We will invite some innovators in the fields of Tech and Cyber to provide short presentations on their current projects. With a chance for attendees to network and ask questions.

We will also provide a further insight into the world of Intelligence Analysis and Cyber Threat Intelligence.

Snacks and refreshments will be provided.

Please sign up so we can get numbers and attract the best innovators.

In the last Meetup we agreed the following Purpose and Objectives, which we will follow as closely as possible:

Purpose:
To develop a regular face-to-face community forum for Intelligence Analysis Professionals to stimulate conversations, share knowledge and create a wide network in the Netherlands
Objectives:
To hold regular Meetups at the Hague Tech and other suitable locations
To enable knowledge and experience share between intelligence professionals
Create and foster community and network of Intelligence Professionals
results.how_to_find_us: The same location as Meetup One but for newcomers it is an ideal location near to central station, providing a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere...
results.name: IAP Meetup Two

meta.description: Access Meetup events using a group, member, or event id. Events in private groups are available only to authenticated members of those groups. To search events by topic or location, see [Open Events](/meetup_api/docs/2/open_events).
